comment._content: Oh thanks for coming back. There are two loads of images from the NA about Gibraltar. Te first set that includes all hose pictures of Jamaica and I think were loaded by Jo Pugh are fine. When you drop the Flickr url into this link commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:UploadWizard then the images are fine. However this image and all the dozens that were loaded at the same time about Gbraltar give the message "file corrupt" when loaded here commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:UploadWizard All the other pictures in Flickr that have a good license work fine in commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:UploadWizard Can you check what is wrong with this one please and see if you can reload the NA Gibraltar pictures as they are wanted. Thanks
